ABOUT.title: Frontend and guitar
ABOUT.subtitle: Learn more about me, how I got here, what do I love in Front-End and also some guitar riffs.

who-am-i.title: Who am I ?
who-am-i.content: I'm Jason Savelli (He / Him). I was born on the 24th of December 1996, in Marignane, France. I'm living in Barbentane, near Avignon, France. I have 2 beautifull doggos that I love more than anything, playing guitar, video games

how-did-i-get-there.title: How did I get there ?
how-did-i-get-there.content: I was an <important>O'Clock<important> student in 2019, where I deepened my love for the web ecosystem. Early in my journey in the web ecosystem, I've found that I really love Javascript so I'm giving 200% of myself in to get better and better everyday.

ABOUT.outside: When I'm not at the computer, you can find me taking photos of beautifull dogs, playing guitar or with my friends.

REFERENCES.title: References
REFERENCES.subtitle: People that can tell you moure
REFERENCES.description: I told you who I am, but sometimes it's also interesting to let other people speak for us. Here's a list of people I've work with who would be happy to tell you how it was working with me.
REFERENCES.privacy: I won't share their contact informations here for privacy reasons, but feel free to ask me and I'll be more than happy send your their contact.
